name: Psycho Kernel
long_description:
A battery Friendly Performance Based Kernel With Psycho Tweaks!
The kernel is in Constant Development Feel free to Contact me and give your suggestions.
Contact
features: ThunderPlug ( A Load based CPU HotPlugging Driver
Default Fast Charging Enabled, No need to configure Anything Additionally
Control Vibration Intensity Level With Thunderquake driver

downloads.name: V3.0
downloads.description: Only for Custom Roms and EUI 5.8.17s (Only 6.0 and 7.x.x ROMs Supported)
changelog: Added Support to Download/Update Kernel From Kernel Audiutor App Itself
